title: CESM2_piClim-aer run completed following the protocol described in https://www.geosci-model-dev.net/9/3447/2016/
description: This run was originally completed using the protocol described in https://www.geosci-model-dev.net/9/3447/2016/. The protocol has been updated and replaced by https://rfmip.leeds.ac.uk. The difference between the two protocols is whether the ozone is set to present day or pre-industrial, These data will be replaced with a new simulation that follow the new protocol.
